content:
OK, for Jira autocomplete when writing the filter for FHIR-I workgroup calls, adding AND specification="s offers no autocomplete; sh finds "shorthand" as an autocomplete; sho again finds nothing. I guess you really have to know the first two letters of your desired value ;-)

Thanks @Eric Haas for helping me debug this query.
You also need to get capitalization correct, I believe
(Yeah that too. I did get the capitalization right in real life; just summarizing here ;-))
